com.carlos.lnsim.lnsim

Class DataFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carlos.lnsim.lnsim.DataFetcher

  • public class DataFetcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to create object entities essential for the network simulation. This class is used to create data fetcher objects to load and fetch local data

    • Method Detail

      • Load

        public void Load()
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Method to fetch and load data from the network map into the system. By default the method searches for a JSON file named "custom.json" to fetch the local data from the network map.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the custom.json file is not found
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If there is a JSON syntax issue when parsing data from the network map to the system

      • getRoutingTable

        public java.util.HashMap<Node,Node> getRoutingTable()
        Method to get the routing table containing all direct paths between nodes
        Returns:
        the routing tables

      • setTrafficGenerator

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        path - New path of the network map

      • getJsonFile

        private org.json.simple.JSONArray getJsonFile(org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser parser,
                                              java.lang.String path)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Method to get the network map file path
        Parameters:
        parser - JSON Parser to parse the network map into the system
        path - Network map file path
        Returns:
        The list of nodes to load them into the network simulator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the path is not found
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - If there is a JSON syntax issue when parsing data from the network map to the system

      • getNodes

        private void getNodes(org.json.simple.JSONArray nodesJson,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> transactions,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Channel> channels,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes,
                      int i)
        Method to create nodes in the lightning network simulator from the network map
        Parameters:
        nodesJson - List of nodes parsed from the network map
        transactions - List of transactions created in the lightning network simulator
        channels - List of channels created in the lightning network simulator
        nodes - List of nodes created in the lightning network simulator
        i - Number to keep track of each selection

        protected Channel findChannel(Channel selectedChannel,
                              int from,
                              int to)
        Method to find a channel by using its id
        Parameters:
        selectedChannel - Channel to be found
        from - Start point from the channel
        to - End point from the channel
        Returns:
        The found channel
